Mod Friday Night Funkin Launcher (Unofficial)

Brief:

Immerse yourself in the rhythm and reflex-challenging world of Mod Friday Night Funkin Launcher. Developed for the avid fan of the famed musical battle game, this unofficial modification elevates the base game's excitement with a competetive edge. It challenges you to win the arrow-based battles by perfectly timing your inputs to the beat of captivating Friday Night tracks.

Crafted with fans in mind, Mod Friday Night Funkin Launcher brings new life to an already vibrant game. Whether you're out to prove your skills or just looking for a fresh take on the rhythm game genre, this mod offers challenging fun at no extra cost.
